attributes.action: We the people of the UK call upon the Government to hold a General Election
attributes.additional_details: There has been such a large amount of crises from strikes and NHS and more.  As the UK government works for the people, we demand an early General election as we no longer believe that the Government is working on our behalf.
attributes.background: After the past few years, the constant change of Prime Ministers, we the people of the UK demand a new General election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
